duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify and target large end users and end user markets to drive sales growth.
Build and maintain strategic relationships with distribution partners to support sales objectives.
Utilize digital technology platforms to identify leads, build relationships, and represent the company's brand.
Engage existing targeted end user customers to understand their needs and buying behavior, best positioning products and solutions.
Develop exceptional relationships with Distributor Sales Representatives (DSRs) to jointly close sales when relevant.
Execute annual business plans to maximize growth and achieve sales targets.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree preferred, with experience in Digital, virtual, and/or social selling platforms.
